snippet: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu of Israel plans to travel to Europe to press for a toughening of sanctions against Tehran.
abstract: Israeli Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu plans to travel to Europe before the end of 2012 to press for toughening of sanctions against Tehran; plan appears to indicate Israeli's shifting emphasis toward efforts to stop the Iranian nuclear program by means other than military action.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu of Israel plans to travel to Europe to press for a toughening of sanctions against Tehran.

headline.main: Netanyahu Appears to Be Shifting Israel’s Iran Policy Toward More Sanctions
headline.print_headline: Netanyahu Appears to Be Shifting Israel’s Iran Policy Toward More Sanctions
